title: Time spent dealing with the requirements of government regulations (% of senior management time)
name: ic.gov.durs.zs
readme: Time spent dealing with the requirements of government regulations is the proportion of senior managements time, in a typical week, that is spent dealing with the requirements imposed by government regulations (e.g., taxes, customs, labor regulations, licensing and registration, including dealings with officials, and completing forms).

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Time spent dealing with the requirements of government regulations is the proportion of senior managements time, in a typical week, that is spent dealing with the requirements imposed by government regulations (e.g., taxes, customs, labor regulations, licensing and registration, including dealings with officials, and completing forms).
